import React, {useRef} from 'react' import {Container ,Row,Col } from "reactstrap" import { Link , NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import '../../Styles/header.css'; const navLinks =[ { path:'/home', display: 'Home' }, { path:'/cars', display: 'Cars' }, { path:'/contact', display: 'Contact' }, { path:'/login' }, { path:'/register' } ] const Header = () => { const menuRef = useRef(null) const toggleMenu =()=>menuRef.current.classList.toggle('menu__active') return

Buy Cars
Fast

Azad Kashmir

Rawalakot City
{/* ============ main navigation ==================== */}
{ navLinks.map((item,index)=>( navClass.isActive ? "nav__active nav__item":"nav__item" } key={index}>{item.display} )) }
} export default Header
